summary: When Scooby and the gang get trapped in a video game created for them, they must fight against the 'Phantom Virus'. To escape the game they must go level by level and defeat the game once and for all.
cast: Scott Innes|Joe Alaskey|Bob Bergen|Grey Griffin|Tom Kane|Mikey Kelley|Gary Anthony Sturgis|B.J. Ward|Frank Welker
keywords: 2000s|animal character name in title|high heels|heels|ballet flats
title: Scooby-Doo y la persecución cibernética
